title: paripAlaya sarasIrruha nayana
sahitya:
paripAlaya sarasIruha nayana 


anupallavi

  caraNam tava kalayE hrdi smara mOhana 


caraNam 1    dIna jana nikara dEvatara ghana vilasita nijadEha jalajanAbha 
mAnitaguNa ripu sancaya mada khaNDana paTubhandana
    caraNam 2    nanda kavi lasitabahA vibhO pada talanata shuka nArada 
mukha ashurEsundara kuruvinda radana suranAyaka sukha dAyaka
    caraNam 3    bOdhakara bhuvananAtha harE phaNi varashaya su-kapOla rucirahAsa 
shrIdhara karuNa nivasana shrta pOSana mrdu bhASaNa
